entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @PressSec Just trying to see if THIS time there's a way to keep Trump's hands off the money and to help WHO prevent a second and third wave of COVID-19 swinging back through the USA. 
Question: Suppose Trump just wants the $$ for his wall? He's already boondoggled BILLIONS.
